import { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { Context } from '../context' function ModalPicture() { const { setModalActive, number, setNumber } = useContext(Context) const [one, setOne] = useState(true) const [two, setTwo] = useState(false) const [three, setThree] = useState(false) const [four, setFour] = useState(false) const mainPhoto = { backgroundImage: `url(../images/image-product-${number}.jpg)`, } const handleOne = () => { setNumber(1) setOne(true) setTwo(false) setThree(false) setFour(false) } const handleTwo = () => { setNumber(2) setOne(false) setTwo(true) setThree(false) setFour(false) } const handleThree = () => { setNumber(3) setOne(false) setTwo(false) setThree(true) setFour(false) } const handleFour = () => { setNumber(4) setOne(false) setTwo(false) setThree(false) setFour(true) } const next = () => { if (number > 0 && number < 4) setNumber(number + 1) } return (
{ setModalActive(false) }}>
{ event.stopPropagation() }}>
) } export { ModalPicture }
